name: Stone-Eater Slime
description: The Stone-Eater Slime is a small, greenish ooze that can dissolve stone and petrify creatures. It has a strong, amorphous body allowing it to squeeze through tight spaces.
memorable: Its ability to petrify foes and dissolve stone makes this slime a formidable opponent, able to consume the very materials that structure its environment.
goals: To dissolve stone and petrify creatures, likely to feed and regain health.
relations: Often found in caves or ruins alongside other oozes, it can be encountered as a guardian of treasure.
environment: Caves, ruins, or areas with significant stone or crystal structures.
strengths: High Constitution for durability, ability to petrify, and dissolve stone.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma limit its interactions and strategic planning.
attacks: Multiattack with two Slam attacks causing bludgeoning and acid damage, with a chance to petrify.
most_powerful_ability: Dissolve Stone lets it destroy stone materials and regain hit points in the process.
senses: It has blindsight up to 60 feet, which allows it to detect its surroundings even while blind.
skills: Has a passive Perception score of 8, indicating its limited awareness.
additional_information: Immune to acid damage and various debilitating conditions.
Doesn't require sleep, remaining active indefinitely.
Can move on difficult surfaces without requiring ability checks.
Destroys stone armor and weapons permanently, weakening foes over time.
Can absorb stone to heal itself.
test_queries: small creature that petrifies and heals
ooze that can damage stone armor
